info.smart_tools.smartactors.core.services.endpoints

Class EndpointHandler<TContext,TRequest>

  • java.lang.Object
    • info.smart_tools.smartactors.core.services.endpoints.EndpointHandler<TContext,TRequest>
  • Type Parameters:
    TContext - type of context associated with endpoint data channel. It is used to avoid unnecessary new instances creation in endpoint.
    TRequest - type of a request received by endpoint
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HttpRequestHandler

    public abstract class EndpointHandler<TContext,TRequest>
extends Object
    Base class with a common message handling logic from endpoints. It will initiate message contexts, generate service fields etc... TODO: Message context creation TODO: 'IsRequest' field processing - do we need it now? Can't we just set a no-op realization of Exchange? TODO: ID generation - will the user associate an ID with the message, or it should be done by server? TODO: do we need an interface for this handler?

      • getMessage

        protected abstract IMessage getMessage(TRequest request)
                                throws Exception
        Parse a message from the given request. Endpoint can receive message in different formats, so we can't make this process common for now. TODO: add serialization exception to the signature TODO: do some endpoints need a context for this operation? TODO: maybe we can extract common deserialization logic by using two methods: getMessageFormat(request) and getMessageBytes(request)
        Parameters:
        request - request to the endpoint
        Returns:
        a deserialized message
        Throws:
        Exception

      • getExchange

        protected abstract Exchange getExchange(IMessage message,
                                        TContext ctx,
                                        TRequest request)
        Get Exchange object used for communication with the message sender.
        Parameters:
        message - a received message
        ctx - endpoint channel context
        request - request to the endpoint
        Returns:
        a Exchange object for the given request
